name: Hvat - GoGodotJam3
description:
Fend off the monsters and upgrade your magic. Survive for as long as you can!

Controls

Use 'WASD' to move

Shoot by pointing the mouse at the enemy and 'Left Click' on the mouse. You can click and hold to shoot as fast as you are able.

Press 'TAB' in order to view the statistics of the game and adjust the volume

Assets

Music by Zen_Man from Pixabay

Sound effects by EgeitiJason

Pixel-art kindly provided by MarcusMMT
